sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload vw-notes-and-files-downloader.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place shortcode: ‘[VW_PROPERTY_LISTING]’ without the inverted commas in your page or post for download files.
sections.faq: Easy to use plugin. Just install it and check under settings for VW Property Listing. Just place the shortcode in any page or post and you should be done.
